signIn.title: Sign in to Elementor
signIn.titleKit: Sign into Elementor to create a{br} new website with this Kit.
signIn.templateTitle: {template, select, trial {Claim Your 7-Day Free Trial} other {}}
signIn.templateSubtitle: {template, select, trial {No credit card required. Let's get you signed up!} other {}}
signIn.question: New to Elementor?

signUp.title: Let's create your {br} Elementor account.
signUp.titleKit: {isMobile, select, true {Nice choice! Create an account to get this Kit.} other {We like your style!{br} Create an Elementor account to get this Kit.}}
signUp.subtitle: For your security, we recommend using an email{br} that you'll have easy access to in the future.
signUp.question: Already have an account?

socialAuthAlert.title: Use your social account to skip authentication
socialAuthAlert.text: Otherwise, you'll need a verification code every time you sign in with your email.
socialAuthAlert.fbBrowser: For the best experience, open this page in your default browser

emailForm.passwordValidationRule: Must be 8+ characters with a mix of upper/lower case, numbers, and special characters.
emailForm.emailHelperText: We'll need to verify your account, so keep this inbox accessible.
emailForm.invalidEmailFormat: Please enter a valid email address. Example: username@domain.com
emailForm.invalidEmail: After checking it out, we can't deliver emails to that address. Try a different one.
emailForm.badEmail: You can use this address, but we might not be able to verify it later. Try a different one.

success.title: Thanks for verifying your email
success.description: You're all set to start building awesome sites with us.

fail.title: That link didn't work.
fail.description: Log back into your account to resend the verification email or

forgotPassword.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email and we'll send you a link that will reset your password.
forgotPassword.successAlert: We sent you a link that will reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password, and you're good to go.

totp.title: Let's verify your account.
totp.description: We sent a verification code to the email address that's connected to this Elementor account.
totp.emailDelay: The email might take a few minutes to appear.
